footer.description: QuantumFlow is the most trusted cryptocurrency trading platform, offering advanced tools and top-tier security. Our mission is to create the best trading experience and give our clients the freedom to trade without limitations.
footer.company_info: QuantumFlow is the trading name of Raw Trading Ltd, which is regulated by the Seychelles Financial Services Authority (FSA) with Securities Dealer’s license number SD016.
footer.risk_warning: Risk Warning: Trading Forex and CFDs carries a high level of risk to your capital and you should only trade with money you can afford to lose. Trading Forex and CFDs may not be suitable for all investors.
footer.execution_notice: Trade execution, pricing, speed, and account access may be affected by a variety of factors including market volatility, order size and type, trading volume, and system performance. During periods of high market activity or limited system availability, delays in account access and trade execution may occur. Investors should be aware of these risks and plan accordingly when placing trades.
footer.age_restriction: You must be 18 years old, or of legal age as determined in your country.

whatIs.title: What is Cryptocurrency?
whatIs.text: Cryptocurrency is a digital or virtual currency that uses cryptography for security. It operates on decentralized networks based on blockchain technology.

blockchain.title: How Does Blockchain Work?
blockchain.text: A blockchain is a distributed ledger that records all transactions across a network. Each block contains multiple transactions, and blocks are linked in chronological order.

popular.title: Popular Cryptocurrencies
popular.bitcoin: The first and most well-known cryptocurrency.
popular.ethereum: Known for its smart contract functionality.
popular.solana: A high-speed blockchain for decentralized apps.

buy.title: How to Buy Crypto
buy.step1: Choose a trusted crypto exchange (e.g. Coinbase, Binance).
buy.step2: Create an account and verify your identity.
buy.step3: Deposit funds via bank transfer or card.
buy.step4: Buy your desired cryptocurrency and store it in a wallet.

tips.title: Important Tips
tips.tip2: Store large amounts in a cold wallet (offline).
tips.tip3: Research before investing in any new token.
tips.tip4: Beware of scams and phishing attempts.

section1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
section1.description: By accessing our website or using our services, you confirm your agreement to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, you may not access or use our platform.

section2.title: 2. Overview of Services
section2.description: We provide digital tools and features to help users manage content, collaborate, and optimize workflows. Specific features may change over time as we improve our services.

section3.title: 3. Account Responsibilities
section3.description: You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure. All activities under your account are your responsibility. Report any unauthorized access immediately.

section4.title: 4. Acceptable Use
section4.description: You agree to use our platform respectfully and lawfully. Any abusive behavior, spam, or interference with other users will result in immediate termination of your account.

section5.title: 5. Payment Terms
section5.description: Certain features may require payment. All charges and billing information are listed transparently. You are responsible for any applicable taxes or fees.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.description: All site content—including branding, design, and code—is the property of our team and may not be copied, distributed, or reused without permission.

section7.title: 7. Disclaimers
section7.description: Our services are provided 'as is.' We make no guarantees about reliability or availability and are not liable for any losses arising from usage or interruptions.

section8.title: 8. Changes to Terms
section8.description: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of our platform indicates your acceptance of any changes made.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience.

typesOfCookies.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.essential: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly, including authentication and security features.
typesOfCookies.analytics: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.
typesOfCookies.functional: Functional Cookies: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences.
typesOfCookies.marketing: Marketing Cookies: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We may use third-party services that set cookies on your device, including Google Analytics and advertising partners.

managingCookies.title: 4. Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

cookieConsent.title: 5. Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.content: By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.

updates.title: 6. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using SalesVault, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

tradingServices.title: 2. Trading Services
tradingServices.content: SalesVault provides cryptocurrency trading services. All trades are executed at your own risk.

accountSecurity.title: 3. Account Security
accountSecurity.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

riskDisclosure.title: 4. Risk Disclosure
riskDisclosure.content: Cryptocurrency trading involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for all investors. Past performance is not indicative of future results.

feesAndCharges.title: 5. Fees and Charges
feesAndCharges.content: Trading fees apply to all transactions. Fee schedules are available on our website and may be updated from time to time.

prohibitedActivities.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: Users may not engage in market manipulation, money laundering, or any other illegal activities on our platform.

limitationOfLiability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: SalesVault shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these terms.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make trades, or communicate with us for support.

howWeUseInfo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

cookiesAndTracking.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookiesAndTracking.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide services and comply with legal obligations.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, subject to appropriate safeguards.

contactUs.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out through any of these channels and we'll get back to you quickly.

liveChat.title: Live Chat
liveChat.description: Get instant help from our support team

fundAccount.question: How do I fund my account?
fundAccount.answer: You can fund your account via bank transfer, credit card, or cryptocurrency deposit. Bank transfers typically take 1-2 business days, while crypto deposits are usually instant after network confirmation.

tradingFees.question: What are your trading fees?
tradingFees.answer: Our fee structure is transparent and competitive. Spot trading fees start at 0.1% for makers and 0.15% for takers. Futures trading fees are as low as 0.02% for makers. Volume discounts are available for high-frequency traders.

withdrawals.question: How long do withdrawals take?
withdrawals.answer: Cryptocurrency withdrawals are processed within 30 minutes during business hours. Bank withdrawals typically take 1-3 business days depending on your bank and location.

insurance.question: Is my account insured?
insurance.answer: Yes, we maintain comprehensive insurance coverage for digital assets and operational risks. Additionally, fiat deposits are protected by FDIC insurance up to $250,000 per account.

cantFind.description: Our support team is here to help with any questions not covered in our FAQ. We pride ourselves on quick response times and knowledgeable assistance.

coldStorage.description: 95% of digital assets stored offline in military-grade secured facilities

insurance.title: Insurance Coverage
insurance.description: $100M insurance policy covering digital assets and operational risks

segregatedAccounts.title: Segregated Accounts
segregatedAccounts.description: Client funds held separately from company assets in regulated banks

multiSig.description: Multiple keys required for all cryptocurrency transactions

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: Real-time threat detection and incident response team

securityTips.title: Account Security Tips
securityTips.tip1: Enable two-factor authentication on your account
securityTips.tip2: Use a unique, strong password with a password manager
securityTips.tip3: Never share your login credentials with anyone
securityTips.tip4: Regularly review your account activity and statements
securityTips.tip5: Contact support immediately if you notice suspicious activity

audits.title: Security Audits
audits.description: Our systems undergo quarterly security audits by leading cybersecurity firms including Deloitte and PwC. All audit reports are available upon request.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.description: We collect different types of information in connection with the services we provide, including:
list: **Personal Information:** Information you provide such as name, email address, and contact details.
**Usage Data:** Information on how you access and use our services, including IP address and device data.
**Device Information:** Information about the device you use to access our services.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.description: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

section3.title: Sharing and Disclosure of Information
section3.description: We may share your information in the following situations:
list: **With Service Providers:** For services performed on our behalf.
**Business Transfers:** In case of mergers or sales.
**With Your Consent:** For any purpose with your permission.

section4.title: Data Security
section4.description: We use appropriate security measures, but no method of transmission is 100% secure.

section5.title: Your Data Protection Rights
section5.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

section6.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section6.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to track activity and store certain information.

section7.title: Links to Other Websites
section7.description: We are not responsible for the content or privacy policies of third-party websites.

section8.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
section8.description: We may update our privacy policy. You should review it regularly.

section9.title: Contact
section9.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us:

Cookie.title: Cookie Usage Notice
Cookie.description: Learn how we use cookies to optimize your experience, personalize content, and analyze traffic.

section1.title: Understanding Cookies
section1.text: Cookies are snippets of data stored on your browser that help websites recognize you on future visits. They're essential for customizing user experience, maintaining sessions, and improving website performance.

section2.title: Our Cookie Categories
items: Core Cookies: These ensure site security and navigation. Without them, our site simply won’t work.
Experience Cookies: Help remember preferences like dark mode, region, or font size.
Metrics Cookies: Track performance anonymously so we can fix bugs and improve features.
Ad Cookies: Tailor promotional content you might see based on your interests.

section3.title: External Cookie Providers
section3.text: We partner with services like Google, Meta, or analytics tools that may place their own cookies to track how you use our site, measure engagement, or deliver ads elsewhere.

section4.title: Customize Cookie Settings
section4.text: Most browsers let you block or delete cookies in their settings. If you block all cookies, some features of our site may not function as expected.

section5.title: Consent & Choices
section5.text: By browsing this site, you agree to our use of cookies. You can withdraw your consent at any time by clearing cookies or adjusting your browser preferences.

section6.title: Updates to This Notice
section6.text: We may revise this cookie notice from time to time. The most current version will always be available on this page.

blog.title: Developer Documentation
blog.subtitle: Comprehensive guide to get you started with our platform. Learn how to integrate, authenticate, and build amazing applications with our powerful APIs and tools.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Welcome to our developer documentation. This guide will walk you through everything you need to know to get started with our platform. From basic setup to advanced integrations, we've got you covered with detailed explanations and practical examples.

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.content: Get up and running in minutes with our streamlined setup process. Follow these simple steps to create your first application, configure your environment, and make your first API call. No complex setup required - just follow along and you'll be building in no time.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.content: Secure your applications with our robust authentication system. Learn how to implement OAuth 2.0, manage API keys, handle user sessions, and ensure your data remains protected. We support multiple authentication methods to fit your specific use case.

apiUrl.question: What is the base API URL?
apiUrl.answer: The base API URL is https://api.example.com/v1. All API endpoints should be prefixed with this URL. Make sure to use HTTPS for all requests to ensure secure communication.

reportBug.question: How do I report a bug or issue?
reportBug.answer: You can report bugs through our GitHub issues page or contact our support team directly. Please include detailed steps to reproduce the issue, expected behavior, and any relevant error messages.

Trading.title: Built for
Trading.description: Enterprise-grade infrastructure meets intuitive design. Every feature engineered for maximum efficiency.

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics.desc: Advanced charts, technical indicators, and market insights powered by AI to help you make informed decisions.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.desc: Multi-layer security with cold storage, 2FA, and insurance coverage to keep your assets safe.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.desc: Execute trades in milliseconds with our high-performance matching engine and global infrastructure.

fees.title: Low Fees
fees.desc: Competitive trading fees starting from 0.1% with volume discounts and maker-taker rebates.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: Round-the-clock customer support with live chat, email, and dedicated account managers.

global.title: Global Access
global.desc: Trade from anywhere in the world with our mobile app and web platform supporting 50+ languages.

Market.title: Real-Time Market Insights
Market.description: Stay ahead with live cryptocurrency prices and market movements updated every 15 seconds.

q1.question: How do I set daily goals?
q1.answer: You can set daily goals by navigating to the 'Goals' section in your dashboard and creating new objectives for the day.

q2.question: What's the best way to prioritize tasks?
q2.answer: We recommend using the Eisenhower Matrix within our task manager to categorize tasks by urgency and importance.

q3.question: Can I integrate with other apps?
q3.answer: Yes, our platform supports integrations with popular tools like Google Calendar, Slack, and Trello. Check our integrations page for more details.

q4.question: How can I improve my focus?
q4.answer: Our built-in Pomodoro timer and distraction-free mode can help you maintain focus during work sessions.

cta.title: Unlock Your Full Potential
cta.description: Ready to take your productivity to the next level? Explore all our features or get personalized assistance from our dedicated support team.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.

1.title: Information We Collect
1.content: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we provide, including:

items.personal: Personal Information: Information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and contact details.
items.usage: Usage Data: How you access and use our services including IP address, browser, and visit details.
items.device: Device Information: Hardware model, OS, and unique device identifiers.

2.title: How We Use Your Information
2.content: We use your information to operate, maintain, improve our services, communicate with you, and prevent fraud.

3.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
3.content: We may share your information with service providers, for legal reasons, during business transfers, or with your consent.

cookies.title: Our Cookie Policy
cookies.description: This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding their use.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.text: Cookies are small text files placed on your device (computer, tablet, mobile) when you visit websites. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.essential: Essential Cookies: These cookies are strictly necessary for the operation of our website. They enable core functionalities like security, network management, and accessibility.
types.analytics: Analytics/Performance Cookies: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website. This data helps us improve the performance and design of our website.
types.functional: Functional Cookies: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make (such as your language or region) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
types.marketing: Marketing/Targeting Cookies: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and to measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.text: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use third-party cookies to report usage statistics and deliver advertisements, such as Google Analytics.

manage.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
manage.text: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can change your browser settings to accept or refuse cookies.

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.text: By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

update.title: Updates to This Policy
update.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our use of cookies or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

auth.content: Understand our security protocols, including API key management, OAuth, and user role permissions.

q1.question: How do I integrate with your API?
q1.answer: Our API is RESTful and can be integrated using standard HTTP methods. Refer to the API Reference section for detailed examples.

q2.question: What are the API rate limits?
q2.answer: Our API has a default rate limit of 100 requests per minute per API key. Higher limits can be requested for Enterprise plans.
